title: FOUR SEASONS SEOUL. Is it the best hotel in town?
description:
Four Seasons Seoul. 
Explore with us a five star triumph in the business district of Seoul, close to the Imperial palace and the US embassy.
See our favourite summer feature: the fabulous al fresco Garden Terrace with great views of South KoreaÂ´s vibrant capital.
And do not miss other IN BED WITH LUXURY episodes on extraordinary luxury hotels, trains and cruises all over the world.
IN BED WITH LUXURY. The unique travel channel.

www.inbedwithluxury.com
